newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Cheung Kong, Hutchison down after results.
newsitem.headline: Cheung Kong, Hutchison down after results.

text.p: Shares of Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd and Hutchison Whampoa Ltd fell on proft-taking after the companies announced interim earnings, brokers said.

"Anticipation of slower earnings growth for both the companies in the second half, especially when Cheung Kong had sold the majority of its development during the first half, triggered profit-taking interest," said Sean Li, associate director from Amsteel Securities.
Shares of Cheung Kong fell HK$0.50 to HK$57 in mid-morning and Hutchison was down HK$0.90 to HK$48.40.
